<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/74481</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74481</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>841afa9c-b5f3-494b-843d-aa698e3a2e51#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A nyelés mechanizmusa</string>
            <string language="en">Mechanism of swallowing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einheit des Schluckens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mécanisme de l'ingestion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mecanismo de engolir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Meccanismo di swallowing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μηχανισμός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mecanismo de tragar</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A nyelés folyamatát szemléltető rajz (szájpadlás, nyelv, gégefedő mozgása)</string>
            <string language="en">Demonstrative drawing about process of swallowing (movement of palate, tongue, epiglottis)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">táplálkozás,  emésztőkészülék,  előbél,  garat,  nyelőcső,  légzés,  nyelés,  </string>
            <string language="en">alimentation, digestive apparatus, anterior bowel, gullet, throat, breathing, swallowing</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Demonstrative Zeichnung über Prozeß des 
Schluckens (Bewegung des Gaumens, der Zunge, des Epiglottis)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Schéma démonstratif au sujet du processus de 
l'ingestion (mouvement de palais, de langue, d'épiglotte)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenho demonstrativo sobre o processo de engolir
(movimento do palate, da lingüeta, do epiglottis)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Illustrazione espansiva circa il processo di 
swallowing (movimento del palato, della linguetta, del epiglottis)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αποδεικτικό σχέδιο για τη διαδικασία (μετακίνηση του 
ουρανίσκου, γλώσσα, epiglottis)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gráfico demostrativo sobre el proceso de tragar 
(movimiento del paladar, de la lengüeta, de la epiglotis)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alimentation, verdauungsfördernder Apparat, 
vorhergehender Darm, Speiseröhre, Kehle, Atmung, schluckend</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">alimentation, appareil digestif, entrailles 
antérieures, oesophage, gorge, respiration, avalant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">alimentation, instrumento digestivo, bowel anterior, 
gullet, garganta, respirar, engolindo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">alimentation, apparecchio digestivo, viscere anteriori, 
esofago, gola, respirare, swallowing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διατροφή, χωνευτικές συσκευές, προηγούμενο έντερο, 
gullet, λαιμός, αναπνοή, κατάποση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">alimentación, aparato digestivo, intestino anterior, 
esófago, garganta, respiración, tragando</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>

      <entry>74481</entry>
